articles.description: Lynyrd Skynyrd announced that guitarist Rickey Medlocke has tested positive for COVID-19, altering a brief run of August 2021 dates.
articles.content:
Lynyrd Skynyrd canceled a string of concerts after learning guitarist Rickey Medlocke tested positive for COVID-19.
